powers.name: We are all family here
powers.description: Get permission and hug someone, then show them this ability. If you do, the player must show you their information.

powers.name: That's need to know only
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this ability to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

powers.name: I didn't see your wedding present on the table
powers.description: If another player has an item in their hands, show them this ability and then get the item.

powers.name: Oh hell no! You're uninvited
powers.description: If a player raises their voice to you, you can show them this ability. If you do, that player is uninvited from the wedding and cannot attend the ceremony. Tell an Organiser when this happens.

goals.name: The more the merrier
goals.description: Get the best of both worlds, marry Corolla and Dave. They may need a bit of convincing.

goals.name: What happens on Buck's night...
goals.description: Make sure no-one (especially Corolla) knows what you did with Dave last night.

goals.name: Convince your monster mother
goals.description: Your mother has been completely against the marriage ever since the first time you introduced Corolla. Make her see how wonderful you are together.

goals.name: Repay your uncle
goals.description: Make sure he knows you are thankful, even though he doesnt want to talk about the money, maybe drop a nod to him in your vows?

goals.name: Rip up any Prenups you are asked to sign.
goals.description: Make a show of it. Unless there is a good reason to sign something...

goals.name: Father in LOSER
goals.description: Sparkie Castro hasn't paid a dime for this wedding. Isn't that meant to be his job? Make sure he knows what that means to you.

players.secret: Hooked up with my Best Man at the Bachelor party.
players.information: Drunk Uncle gave me a huge cash gift before the wedding.
players.blurb: Last Night: It was your bachelor party. Best Man, Drunk Uncle, Wedding Planner, Bride’s Father, Dog was there. You were grabbed from your bed, black bagged and taken on a 8 hour pub crawl. You had to drink everytime anyone else did and got pretty blasted. Bride's Father left at some point, you think he was worse than you. You all went to a hotel, and were told there would be some 'friends' coming voer soon by your Drunk Uncle. They never rocked up, and as you sat talking to your Best Man you realised that you hadn't experienced all there was in the single life yet. The sex was fantastic. You still love your bride and want to get married.
players.title: Groom

powers.name: Oh are you talking about me?
powers.description: If you overhear someone say your name (or The Bride) walk over and show them this power. If you do, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

powers.name: Storm Off
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead. Then storm off in a huff.

powers.name: GET OUT!
powers.description: Make a huge scene about how a player is ruining your wedding, and show them this power. If you do, that player is uninvited from the wedding and cannot attend the ceremony. Tell an Organiser when this happens.

goals.name: Have the perfect wedding
goals.description: BIG ring. Mercedes as Flowergirl. No drunks, any groom (meh I'm easy).

goals.name: Get divorced from Malibu
goals.description: You can't get married until you first get divorced. Find out who or how to get it annulled and keep it a secret.

goals.name: It's lucky they say...
goals.description: Find something borrowed, something blue, something old & something new. (Item cards will help you)

goals.name: Uninvite anyone trying to sabotage the wedding
goals.description: If anyone doesn't want you to marry the love of your life, then they need to go.

goals.name: Mercedes is such a bitch
goals.description: She thinks she is so tough, well she HAS to be here and wear that dress. Don't let her get uninvited and generally make her time here unpleasant.

players.information: Maid of Honor got hammered last night.
players.blurb: Last Night: It was your Bachelorette party. You asked for a night in of party games & Rom Coms but the Maid of Honor had other plans. She and the Groom's Mother rocked up, drunk as skunks. You went to a Casino, Pole Dancing and then did donuts in a local parking lot. The Maid of Honor puked over your favourite party dress and you yelled at her for ruining your bachelorette party.
players.title: Bride

powers.name: Information
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their information.

powers.name: Pickpocket
powers.description: Talk to an Organiser and specify a player and an item. If the player has such an item, you will steal it from them. If the player doesn’t, you will steal an item at random.

goals.name: Don't get married
goals.description: Make sure the Bride makes it down the aisle in one piece, you definitly dont want to accidently get married.

goals.name: Find the ring before anyone else
goals.description: You lost it, so you must find it to restore Corolla's faith in you. Someone must of seen it after last night.

goals.name: Make Mercedes act her age
goals.description: Mercedes acts far too adult for her age, as her past baby sitter you are responsible for making sure she can stay a child.

goals.name: Have a fling with the best man
goals.description: If you are the Maid of Honor its only natural you get with the Best Man, whoever that is...

goals.name: Don't work on your day off
goals.description: You are an off-duty cop, you absolutely refuse to do any police work at this wedding.

players.secret: During cop academy you became an alcoholic.
players.information: You heard the ring came from the Drunk Uncle.
players.blurb: Last Night: You attended the Bachorette party. You had planned for it to be a night in of party games and romcoms, but the Groom’s Mother had other ideas. She brought a bunch of the nicer boxed wine over beforehand and you pre-gamed a little too hard. The rest of the night was a blur. You vaguely recall a casino and getting donuts. You have a massive headache and have vowed to never drink again. After the wedding.
players.title: Maid of Honor

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Defend
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

powers.name: Pickpocket
powers.description: Talk to an Organiser and specify a player and an item. If the player has such an item, you will steal it from them. If the player doesn’t, you will steal an item at random.

goals.name: Get out of this horrorshow
goals.description: Get uninvited from the wedding, this dress is not your style.

goals.name: Find a reason Corolla can't marry
goals.description: She has to have some skeletons in her closet. You certainly do at this age.

goals.name: Sabotage Gemini's every move
goals.description: She tried to have you taken away, and you ended up on the streets. Now she is gonna pay.

goals.name: Don't give out any more free samples
goals.description: Sparkie never pays, its now $1000 a hit for that loser. Perhaps someone else will buy?

players.secret: I run the entire town's drug trade.
players.information: I saw the Maid of Honor trying on the wedding ring at the bachelorette party.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were too young to be there, but someone had to make it a real party. You gave the Maid of Honor a small dose of Ketamine and she took it hard. Oops. You werent allowed in the Casino, so you left and made a few sales.
players.title: Flowergirl

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Information
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their information.

powers.name: Reveal
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you all items they have on them.

goals.name: This wedding has to happen
goals.description: SOMEONE is getting married. You don't really care who.

goals.name: Make the wedding proper
goals.description: The bride needs something borrowed, something blue, something old & something new or this wedding is just pedestrian. Don’t let these Bogan’s sully the sanctity of marriage.

goals.name: Run this wedding
goals.description: You are the one in charge around here. Make sure no one else thinks otherwise. You have a great speech planned for the ceremony you have to give. (note: maybe write one?)

goals.name: Vectra is your nemisis
goals.description: She acts like she is better than the rest, but she is just another bogan scum. Make sure she knows that.

players.secret: You have been paid $15,000 anonymously to make sure this wedding goes ahead.
players.information: The Wedding Planner is married, but didn't bring their partner.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were not at either of the Bachelor or Bachelorette parties, but everyone seems real hung over.
players.title: Marriage Officiant

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

powers.name: Defend
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

goals.name: Marry the Groom.
goals.description: You love that gorgious son of a gun.

goals.name: Rekindle Mailbu's old love
goals.description: Mailbu seemed real broken up at the bucks about an old flame. Help them.

goals.name: Get {Marriage Officiant f} fired
goals.description: They think they are better than us. Get Chad or someone else to kick them out of the wedding.

players.secret: The stripper's never showed up to the hotel last night.
players.information: The Groom's Mother recovered from last night better than anyone else.
players.blurb: Last night: You were at the Bachelor party. You kidnapped the Groom and brought him on the greatest pub crawl of all time. You went light on the drinks because you wanted to be sharp for your best friend’s wedding the next day. After the last bar you all went back to a hotel and you and the Groom and you split a room. One thing led to another and you both boned down. Hard. It was something you had always thought about, but didn’t think would ever happen. Everyone thinks you got strippers for the night, and you’ve decided to let everything think that.
players.title: Best Man

powers.name: Defend
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

powers.name: Legal paperwork
powers.description: You can draw up any contract for anyone. (Ask an Organiser for help)

goals.name: Interrupt the ceremony
goals.description: Declare your love for {Bride f}. Annouce she can't marry someone else if she is already married. Make a big speech.

goals.name: Stay married to {Bride f}
goals.description: Steal some private moments alone with her. Maybe she will remember the good old days.

goals.name: Officiate this shingdig
goals.description: If you are the marriage boss, you can just fake the paperwork and it wont count! Your big speech can be longer too!

goals.name: {Bride's Father f} needs a hand
goals.description: {Bride's Father f} needs help getting down the aisle with his daughter. Make sure he stays upright.

players.secret: You are already married to the Bride.
players.information: You got a one night stand at the last pub and brought them back to the hotel. From the banging on the walls it sounded like everyone else got lucky too.
players.title: Wedding Planner

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Reveal
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you all items they have on them.

goals.name: Get through the ceremony without crying
goals.description: You better have some drugs on hand to make it through the ceremony. You need to hold it together for your little girl.

goals.name: Impress {Groom's Mother}
goals.description: It was a long time ago, but she is still as smoking as ever. If you could find a way to impress her maybe there is still something there.

goals.name: Keep {Dog f} out of mischief
goals.description: Make sure if the dog takes anything you return it to its rightful owner. And keeps its nose out of the trash!

goals.name: Find the real father
goals.description: You suspected {Bride f} is pregnant for a while now. But she has only been with {Groom f} for that long. Keep it a secret but find out who is the father.

players.secret: You have a serious drug problem.
players.information: The Groom's mother tried to get a prenup signed but the Groom blocked it.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were at the Bachelor party. You kidnapped the Groom and brought him on a pretty nice pub crawl. You managed to get quite turped up. Plus you found your dealer and scored some Ketamine. Rest of the night is pretty blurry but at one point everyone put you in a taxi to go home. You have woken up with a hangover, and are ready for a bonza wedding.
players.title: Bride's Father

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Reveal
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you all items they have on them.

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

goals.name: Stop the Wedding!
goals.description: While it will be too shameful to say the real reason (they are half siblings), sabotage the wedding at every chance you get.

goals.name: Don't let anyone know you took the BIG rings at the Bachelorette party
goals.description: You threw them in the trash, but people are putting together the dots from last night.

goals.name: Get a pre-nup signed by the Bride and Groom
goals.description: Your brother is loaded, and you can't stand the thought that the Castro's get their hands on that money.

goals.name: Mercedes is in need of a mother
goals.description: Her mother is no longer in the picture, it's the right thing to do.

players.secret: 20 years ago you had an affair with Bride's Father.
players.information: You brought the nicer boxed wine to the Bachorette party.
players.blurb: Last Night: Brought drinks, got Maid of Honor drunk. When she brought out the wedding ring you stole it. You threw it in the trash just before getting to the wedding today. You didn't drink a drop.
players.title: Groom's Mother

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

powers.name: Defend
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

powers.name: Special
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this something special happens

goals.name: Get onto the wedding party
goals.description: You don't care what role you take, but being in the crowd is no fun.

goals.name: That ring is an family heirloom, make sure its not lost
goals.description: Find the ring and hold on to it for the ceremony. It was your nan's!

goals.name: Hide your wealth
goals.description: Make sure no one realises, or talks about that it was you that gave money to {Groom f} or {Wedding Officiant f}.

players.information: The Groom's father died in drag race 2 years ago.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were at the Bachelor party. You wanted to treat everyone so you paid for drinks on the pub crawl the whole night and also the hotel afterwards. You didn’t stay until the end because you got a bit too drunk. You were planning on setting everyone up with strippers at the hotel, but you never got a chance to set it up.
players.title: Drunk Uncle

powers.name: Defend
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

powers.name: Information
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their information.

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

goals.name: Be the flowergirl
goals.description: You would look amazing, the star of the show!

goals.name: Find out why {Groom f} and {Bride's Father f} smell similiar
goals.description: They must like playing together!

goals.name: Find a way to get back to your old owner
goals.description: If you could only explain who they were, or had a picture, someone might take you back to them.

goals.name: Catch the bouquet
goals.description: Catch? Thats my favourite!

goals.name: Be a good dog
goals.description: If anyone feeds you, make sure to help them out when you can.

players.secret: You were a stunt dog from the famous TV show WoWza.
players.information: The Groom and Best Man stayed in the same hotel room.
players.blurb: Cursed by a wizard, you roam the lands in search of your true form once again, you have the intelligence of a man but the form of a dog.
players.title: Dog

powers.name: Pickpocket
powers.description: Talk to an Organiser and specify a player and an item. If the player has such an item, you will steal it from them. If the player doesn’t, you will steal an item at random.

powers.name: Secret
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

goals.name: Object at the wedding!
goals.description: There is definitly something fishy going on here. If you find evidence make sure to object and explain the whole travesty.

goals.name: Find out why the {Drunk Uncle f} gave {Groom f} a large sum of money
goals.description: Confront them and try to find why money is changing hands.

goals.name: Get a photo of {Flowergirl f} doing something illegal (Use you phone)
goals.description: {Flowergirl f} didn't want their photo taken at the Bachelorette party. Weird.

players.secret: Driving late at night you hit someone. It was dark, but you kept on driving...
players.information: You heard there is an off duty cop at the wedding.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were hired to join the Bachelorette party. Strange but they are country folk. You got some great shots, the Maid of Honor was super blasted, and the Flowergirl would not let herself be photographed.
players.title: Photographer

items.name: $15,000 Cash
items.description: A lot of money neatly rolled up.

items.name: Certificate of Marriage
items.description: It says that {Bride f} and {Wedding Planner f} was married 2 years ago. It's still valid.

items.name: Certificate of Marriage (Annulled)
items.description: It says that {Bride f} and {Wedding Planner f} was married 2 years ago. It's has been annulled recently.
